body_text:
The 'extension' select element on the Opt Out Study fields does not populate correctly. Essentially, there is no Query component on the page to actually load the extensions, which means that whatever is currently loaded in store is displayed in the select.
This can be reproduced by opening the /recipe/new page, switching to opt-out-study, and viewing the XPI select field. The field will be empty, until you navigate to /extension and actually load the list.
This should be resolved by adding a Query component near the extension select element on the Opt Out fields.

title: Extension select element doesn't populate correctly
body:
The 'extension' select element on the Opt Out Study fields does not populate correctly. Essentially, there is no Query component on the page to actually _load_ the extensions, which means that whatever is currently loaded in store is displayed in the select.

This can be reproduced by opening the `/recipe/new` page, switching to `opt-out-study`, and viewing the XPI select field. The field will be empty, until you navigate to `/extension` and actually load the list.

This should be resolved by adding a Query component near the extension select element on the Opt Out fields.
